subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: For the first time since the N.F.L.-A.F.L. merger, the postseason could feature three rookies starting at quarterback, providing a showcase for players who are the future of the league.
snippet: For the first time since the N.F.L.-A.F.L. merger, the postseason could feature three rookies starting at quarterback, providing a showcase for players who are the future of the league.
